message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a fantastic deal, considering its value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $8,200 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $8,800. This reflects a fair compromise, and I'm confident the product will be worth it to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $8,800. I'm thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
